item.title: Docker, containerd, CRI, CRI-O, OCI, runc Explained and How They Work Together
item.author: xianpeng.shen@gmail.com (Xianpeng Shen)
item.description: This article introduces the key components and standards in the container ecosystem, such as Docker, containerd, CRI, CRI-O, OCI, and runc, explaining their relationships and how they work together.
